titleStmt.title: [Receipt] 1815 Nov. 30, Return J. Meigs and John Ross to the United States : a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Special Collections Library, University of Tennessee, Knoxville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Special Collections Librarian, Hoskins Library, University of Tennessee, 1401 Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN 37996. (865) 974-4480.

bibl.title: [Receipt] 1815 Nov. 30, Return J. Meigs and John Ross to the United States
bibl.note: This document is a receipt for tobacco for the Cherokee Indians paid to the United States by Return J. Meigs, agent to the Cherokee and John Ross, a Cherokee Chief

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

row.cell:
107 1/2 lbs Tobacco pr Colo. Meigs for
Cherokees _____ 1/3

div1.p: Received of Return J Meigs forty five dollars & fifty Two cents in full for the above a/c Signed Duplicates for Meigs & Ross
